original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Dukadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (6)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya

original: 12.2. Hetuduka, Cūḷantaraduka
analyzed: hetu duka cūḍantara duka

original: Nahetuṁ naappaccayaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na hetum na appaccayam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na appaccayaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nahetuṁ naappaccayaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na hetum na appaccayam dhammam paṭicca na na hetu na appaccayaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nahetuṁ naappaccayaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naappaccayo ca nanahetu naappaccayo ca
analyzed: na hetum na appaccayam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na appaccayaḥ ca na na hetu na appaccayaḥ ca

original: dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Nanahetuṁ naappaccayaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: nana hetum na appaccayam dhammam paṭicca nana hetu na appaccayaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nanahetuṁ naappaccayaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na na hetum na appaccayam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na appaccayaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nanahetuṁ naappaccayaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naappaccayo ca nanahetu naappaccayo
analyzed: na na hetum na appaccayam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na appaccayaḥ ca na na hetu na appaccayaḥ

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Nahetuṁ naappaccayañca nanahetuṁ naappaccayañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naappaccayo
analyzed: na hetum na appaccayam ca na na hetum na appaccayam ca dhammam paṭicca na hetu na appaccayaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ naappaccayañca nanahetuṁ naappaccayañca dhammaṁ
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetum na appaccayam ca na na hetum na appaccayam ca dhamma

original: paṭicca nanahetu naappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ naappaccayañca
analyzed: paṭicca na na hetu na appaccayaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetum na appaccayam ca

original: nanahetuṁ naappaccayañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naappaccayo ca nanahetu naappaccayo
analyzed: na na hetum na appaccayam ca dhammam paṭicca na hetu na appaccayaḥ ca na na hetu na appaccayaḥ

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava sabbattha nava

original: Nahetuṁ naasaṅkhataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na hetum na asaṅkhatam dhammam paṭicca

original: Nahetuṁ nasanidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na hetum na sa nidassanam dhammam paṭicca

original: Nahetuṁ nasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na hetum na sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca

original: Nahetuṁ naappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na hetum na appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Nahetuṁ narūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na hetum na rūpim dhammam paṭicca

original: Nahetuṁ naarūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na hetum na arūpim dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Nahetuṁ nalokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ nalokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na hetum na lokiyam dhammam paṭicca pe na hetum na lokuttaram dhammam paṭicca

original: Nahetuṁ nakenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ nanakenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na hetum na kenacid viññeyyam dhammam paṭicca pe na hetum na na kenacid viññeyyam dhammam paṭicca
